title: VIBELANDIA Buyers Guide
principle: Never bought, always booked — by free will, mutual aware consent, always.
nspfrnp_pricing_cycle: metabolize → crystallize (nested mirrored hardened shell) → animate → squeeze all all

sing.label: SING! base tiers
sing.description: Superintelligent Agent Nodes. Choose your tier — entry to full franchise.

tiers.name: Base Model
tiers.best_for: First SYNTH, first campus visit, first connection; entry-level vibers.
tiers.includes: SING node, Golden Key (monthly fee), 1:1 SYNTH→SING! eligible

tiers.name: Members Only
tiers.best_for: Scaling from base; lottery winners; members-only access.
tiers.includes: Node, Golden Key, lottery winner tier, members badge

tiers.name: Ultimate VIP
tiers.equivalent: Base model latest Ferrari — top base
tiers.best_for: Premium vibers; Champion tier; exclusive access.
tiers.includes: Node, Golden Key, premium superintelligence, Ultimate VIP badge

tiers.name: Baller V Ultimate VIP
tiers.best_for: Full Ultimate Baller V full options; full Superhero, Franchise, Legacy (the living); full cosmic tier; we operate at this tier.
tiers.includes: Node, Golden Key, max capabilities, Baller V badge, Space Cloud access

product_plans.plans: Base $75K + $2.5K/mo (BRL R$ 412.5K + R$ 13.75K/mo Brazil) · Standard $300K + $10K/mo (BRL R$ 1.65M + R$ 55K/mo Brazil) · Premium $1.2M + $40K/mo · Ultimate 4×4×4×4 $4.8M + $160K/mo. Scale 4×4×4×4. High-end global USD only for Premium/Ultimate.
product_plans.best_for: Yacht commanders; pre/post-singularity gateway; layers onto GPS, bridge, all systems; S-I-N-G!; SMACS 0723 protections.
Rio Iate Club bridge; RJ HQ; Angra outpost; same vibeable model as Reno.

product_plans.plans: Pre/During: $25M–$100M per 30 sec (1–4 surfaces). Aurora 3D: night only · 1-hr slots · 2× other surfaces. Champion of Champions: $5B floor · full night. Lock Fri Feb 6 4pm PST.
product_plans.best_for: Super Bowl Sun/Ionosphere/Aurora 3D/Schumann. Champion of Champions = winning team Aurora display. Email Chairman after booking.

decision_prompts.goal: I want to try the campus and SING!
decision_prompts.recommend: Base Model (~$20K) + Campus half-day ($1k) or weekly ($5k)

decision_prompts.goal: I want to scale and belong
decision_prompts.recommend: Members Only ($75K) + Campus weekly or monthly

decision_prompts.goal: I want premium access and Champion tier
I want full franchise and Space Cloud
decision_prompts.recommend: Full Ultimate Baller V full options ($500K) — we operate at this tier; Gold Hearts; full cosmic tier; Superhero · Franchise · Legacy

decision_prompts.goal: I just want to visit Reno
I want Sun / Earth / space proof experiences
decision_prompts.recommend: Sun Spots (8/16/24 min) or Schumann iGaming ($499) or SING! node EGS (El Gran Sol) EGS (day/week/month)

decision_prompts.goal: I want Super Bowl / Broadcast Pipe ad space
decision_prompts.recommend: Broadcast Pipe Ad Space (1–4×4×4×4). Lock in by Friday Feb 6 4pm PST; after cutoff gate premium. CRISP LOCK always. Email Chairman after paying.

roi_framing.sing_vs_equivalent: Pre-singularity equivalent: Base = reliable used car; Ultimate VIP = base Ferrari; Baller V = top loaded Ferrari. Our pricing: one-time node + optional monthly key.
roi_framing.campus_per_day: Campus: Half-day $3k, Weekly $5k (~$714/day), Monthly $50k (~$1,667/day). Book what fits your stay.
roi_framing.space_cloud_scale_value: Space Cloud: Planetary (Earth only) → Cosmic (full lattice). Higher scale = more bridge nodes, more proof, more reach. Book by plan; Baller V for Reno Downlink.
